column4: please..  I've run into trouble with ubuntu not saving on my HD, can someone provide guidance on whether my current setup looks ok? http://www.screencast.com/t/SuXllxTx
once ubuntu is installed, close the virtual machine.  set the machine to boot from the HD.  turn the virtual machine on and it should boot ubuntu.
ok, how do i set the machine to boot from HD?
did you complete the ubuntu installation??
VIRTUAL BOX: machine>close>do not save the settings
save the machine state, send the shutdown signal or power off the machine?
that should do it.   turn the machine on
for full screen support, see virtual box help for "install guest additions"
thanks, i think I installed it haha
